ValidationRule.description: Once the Sample Order is submitted for Approval, it can't be edited
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(TEXT(Salesforce_Order_Type__c) = 'ZOR') && ( ISPICKVAL( Order.Status , 'In Process/Package Preparation') || ISPICKVAL( Order.Status , 'Approved') || ISPICKVAL( Order.Status , 'Completed') || ISPICKVAL( Order.Status , 'Cancelled')) && ( ISCHANGED(Description) || ISCHANGED(Quantity) || ISCHANGED(Sample_Item_Approval_Status__c ) || ISCHANGED(Quantity_UoM__c ) || ISCHANGED(Approver__c ) || ISCHANGED(Plant__c ) || ISCHANGED(Salesforce_Order_Type__c ) || ISCHANGED(Sales_Organisation__c ) || ISCHANGED(S4_Order_Type__c ) || ISCHANGED(Distribution_Channel__c ) || ISCHANGED(S4_Item_Category__c ) || ISCHANGED(Division__c ) || ISCHANGED(Commodity__c ) || ISCHANGED(Country_Of_Origin__c ) || ISCHANGED(UnitPrice ) || ISCHANGED(Order_Product_External_ID__c ) || ISCHANGED(Sample_Master_Matrix_Data__c ) )
&& NOT($Permission.Integration_User ) && $User.Username <> 'support.gauri@gauri.com.syn'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once Sample Order is Submitted for Approval, the Order Product cannot be edited
